name: The Intrepid Explorer
description:
The Intrepid Explorer is a short horror game set in the mid 1800s, where you take on the role of a diver tasked to venture down into the deep dark ocean, in search of the wreck of 'The Intrepid Explorer', to retrieve a mysterious item lost over a 100 years ago.

Who knows what ghastly creatures lurk in the depths below...

Average Game Time is 10-15 Minutes.

WalkLook AroundInteractFlashlightW,A,S,DMouseEF

Make sure to unzip the folder (Don't put it into another 'The Intrepid Explorer' folder, as it can cause conflicts). Open the folder 'TheIntrepidExplorer/WindowsNoEditor' and the application is in this folder, named 'TheIntrepidExplorer'.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

I hope you enjoy playing my game as much as I have enjoyed making it. This was my first project, and I'm looking forward to learning more and bringing you another project soon!
